articles.title: Reception in Honor of Participants in April Spring Art Festival
articles.content:
Greetings to Queen of Denmark 
    Pyongyang, April 16 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, sent a message of greetings to Margrethe II, queen of Denmark, on April 14 on the occasion of its national day.
 The message sincerely wished her good health and happiness and the Danish people wellbeing and prosperity.

articles.title: Congratulations to Sri Lankan Prime Minister
articles.content:
Reception in Honor of Participants in April Spring Art Festival 
    Pyongyang, April 16 (KCNA) -- The Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly hosted a reception at the People's Palace of Culture on Thursday evening in honor of the participants in the 22nd April Spring Friendship Art Festival on the occasion of the Day of the Sun.
 Present on invitation were foreign delegations and delegates, foreign artistes and overseas Korean artistes participating in the festival.    
 On hand were Pak Pong Ju, premier of the DPRK Cabinet, Yang Hyong Sop, vice-president of the SPA Presidium, Jong Ha Chol, secretary of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, Kim Jong Ho, chairman of the organizing committee of the festival, Jong Mun San, chief secretary of the Cabinet, Ryang Man Gil, chairman of the Pyongyang City People's Committee, the vice chairmen of the organizing committee of the festival and officials concerned.
 Speeches were made there.

articles.title: 14th National Festival of Loyalty of Youth and Children Closes
articles.content:
Congratulations to Sri Lankan Prime Minister 
    Pyongyang, April 16 (KCNA) -- Pak Pong Ju, premier of the DPRK Cabinet, sent a message of greetings to Mahindra Rajapakse upon his appointment as prime minister of Sri Lanka.
 Expressing the belief that the friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries would grow stronger, the message wished him greater success in his responsible work.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Work Published in Guinea
Reception Given for Overseas Koreans
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Work Published in Guinea 
    Pyongyang, April 16 (KCNA) -- Leader Kim Jong Il's famous work "The Workers' Party of Korea Is the Party of the Great Leader Comrade Kim Il Sung" was brought out in booklet by the National Education Publishing House of Guinea on April 6.

articles.title: DPRK Orders and Medals Awarded to Foreign Figures

articles.content:
DPRK Orders and Medals Awarded to Foreign Figures 
    Pyongyang, April 16 (KCNA) -- A ceremony was held at the Mansudae Assembly Hall yesterday to confer orders and medals of the DPRK on visiting foreign figures on the occasion of the Day of the Sun.
 At the ceremony Friendship Orders Second Class were awarded to Sakae Araki, deputy secretary general of the International Institute of the Juche Idea, Fujio Hanawa, secretary general of the Japanese National Liaison Council of Societies for the Study of Juche Idea, N. Sarantuya, executive chairman of the Mongolian Mt Paektu Association, and Songchit Pullarp, chairman of the Organization for the Study of Juche Idea of Thailand, who have supported the Korean people in their efforts for the building of a great prosperous powerful socialist nation of Juche and independent reunification of the country and actively studied and disseminated the immortal Juche idea and conducted the movement for friendship and solidarity with humble reverence for President Kim Il Sung and leader  Kim Jong Il. And the Friendship Medals were conferred on 8 figures.    
 Present at the ceremony were Yang Hyong Sop, vice-president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, Kim Yong Il, vice-chairman of the Korean Social Scientists Association, officials concerned and Vishwanath, director general of the International Institute of the Juche Idea, and members of delegations of foreign organizations for the study of Juche idea.
